content.simple-702227-0-0: Lata Mondal (born: 16 January 1993) is a Bangladeshi cricketer who plays for the Bangladesh national women's cricket team.
content.simple-702227-0-1: She is a right handed bat.

content.normal-41918715-0-0: Lata Mondal ( ; born: 16 January 1993, Dhaka) is a Bangladeshi cricketer who plays for the Bangladesh national women's cricket team.
content.normal-41918715-0-1: She is a right handed batter.
content.normal-41918715-1-0: Mondal was born on January 16, 1993 in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
content.normal-41918715-2-0: Mondal made her ODI career against the Ireland women's cricket team on November 26, 2011.
content.normal-41918715-3-0: Mondal made her T20I career against the Ireland women's cricket team on August 28, 2012.
content.normal-41918715-3-1: In October 2018, she was named in Bangladesh's squad for the 2018 ICC Women's World Twenty20 tournament in the West Indies.
content.normal-41918715-4-0: Mondal was a member of the team that won a silver medal in cricket against the China national women's cricket team at the 2010 Asian Games in Guangzhou, China.

content.simple-697879-0-0: Lahja Tuulikki Ukkola ("née" Parviainen; 28 November 1943 – 28 May 2019) was a Finnish politician and journalist.
content.simple-697879-0-1: She started working for the newspaper "Kaleva" in 1962.
content.simple-697879-0-2: She served as an MP for the Oulu constituency for the Liberal People's Party from 1991 to 1995.
content.simple-697879-0-3: She was also the leader of the party between 1993 and 1995.
content.simple-697879-0-4: In 2007, Ukkola was again elected as an MP for Oulu, this time for the National Coalition Party, serving until 2011.
content.simple-697879-1-1: She died on 28 May 2019 in Oulu, at the age of 75.

content.normal-60918445-0-0: Lahja Tuulikki Ukkola ("née" Parviainen; 28 November 1943 – 28 May 2019) was a Finnish politician and journalist.
content.normal-60918445-0-1: Born in Taivalkoski, she began working for the newspaper "Kaleva" in 1962.
content.normal-60918445-0-2: As a member of the Liberal People's Party, she served as an MP for the Oulu constituency from 1991 to 1995.
content.normal-60918445-0-3: She was also the leader of the party between 1993 and 1995.
content.normal-60918445-0-4: Following the 2007 national parliamentary election, Ukkola was again elected as an MP for Oulu, this time for the National Coalition Party, serving until 2011.
content.normal-60918445-1-0: Ukkola died on 28 May 2019 in Oulu, at the age of 75.

content.simple-120452-0-0: Kot Sarang is a village and Union Council, an administrative subdivision, of Chakwal District in the Punjab Province of Pakistan, it is part of Talagang Tehsil and is located at 33°2'14N 72°23'11E.

content.normal-14570332-0-0: Kot Sarang is a village and union council of Pakistan, an administrative subdivision, of the Chakwal District in the Punjab Province of Pakistan, it is part of Talagang Tehsil.
content.normal-14570332-0-1: The Sawan River and the village of Jisial are nearby.
content.normal-14570332-1-0: Many are farmers dependent upon rain for irrigation.
content.normal-14570332-1-1: One or more members of every family work in foreign countries.
content.normal-14570332-1-2: OGDCL is another source of employment.
content.normal-14570332-2-0: Kot Sarang benefits from good sewerage and water supply systems and has paved streets
